traits.name: Flyby
entries: The sky drake doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The sky drake has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sky drake makes one bite attack and one attack with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage and 5 (2d4 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
